system.description: Gem dragons ensure their agents’ missions go undetected by bestowing upon them subterfuge magic. You know the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.4gcxix2l4zvy9kdu]{Message} cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.hq8bkkiar9tfk0sh]{Illusory Script} once per long rest. At 5th level, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.4eidicv0lyqevtwd]{Invisibility} once per long rest. You don’t need material components for these spells, and when casting them your spellcasting ability is Intelligence or Charisma (whichever is highest).
